response: "datenschutz ist wichtig! 💻👀🔒 aber wovon sprechen wir eigentlich, wenn wir von "persönliche informationen" sprechen? 🤔 was belongs actually to our personal information? 🤷‍♂️ is it our name, address, phone number? 📞 or is it more than that? 🤔 what about our interests, habits, relationships? 🤝 do we have control over our digital footprints? 💻👀 can we actually delete our data trail? 🧯 these are questions we should ask ourselves when thinking about data privacy. 🤔👍 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalfootprint"
